    1: <?php
    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource\Addon;
    3:
    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File AS File;
    6: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model AS Model;
    7: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource AS Resource;
    8:
    9: /** Return addon path.
    10: * @return String $path Env\Path('root')
    11: */
    12: function Path () {
    13: $rcsite = Model\RcSite\Load(Resource\paths(), Resource\Related\path_info());
    14: $dir = $rcsite->AddonDir;
    15: $res = Env\Param('resource');
    16: $path = File\mkpath($dir, $res);
    17: return (is_dir($path)) ? $path : false;
    18: }
    19:
    20: /** Return addon url.
    21: * @return String $url Env\Param('relative')
    22: */
    23: function Url () {
    24: $rcsite = Model\RcSite\Load(Resource\paths(), Resource\Related\path_info());
    25: $dir = str_replace(Env\Path('root'), '', $rcsite->AddonDir);
    26: $res = Env\Param('resource');
    27: return File\mkpath(Env\Param('offset').$dir, $res);
    28: }
    29:
    30: /** Return addon id.
    31: * @return String $id use addon namespace
    32: */
    33: function Id () {
    34: $arr = explode('\\', __NAMESPACE__);
    35: return array_pop($arr);
    36: }
    37:
